thread.title_full: Larson Tax Relief reviewed by Mark L

author: Mark L
title: Mark L
text: I had been very ill with multiple hospitalizations, and when I was recovering, I owed $80,000 to the IRS, with no energy or clue on what I needed to do. I turned to Larson, and they evaluated my situation, and determined a clear path for me to take. I needed time to refinance my home, and could not afford to let the IRS file tax liens that would derail that process. Larson kept with me, negotiated with the IRS, bought me the time I needed, and provided excellent communications along the way. I really felt that they cared about my situation. Once the taxes were settled, they helped me file for penalty abatements, and I just found out that I was getting $11,000 back. I feel that Larson was a great choice for me, and if you are in a similar situation, I believe they can help relieve the stress and help deal with a problem that too many of us face. They helped me turn my life around and for that I am grateful.
